thread.title: PBS NewsHour Weekend full episode October 3, 2015
thread.title_full: Video: PBS NewsHour Weekend full episode October 3, 2015 | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour Weekend full episode October 3, 2015
text: On this edition for Saturday, October 3, 2015, a United States airstrike against the Taliban in Afghanistan accidentally hits a hospital, killing and wounding dozens. In our signature segment, transforming how America's teachers are trained. Hari Sreenivasan anchors from New York.
